discourse_list.title: CEO Of Cryptocurrency And Forex Trading Platform Charged With Fraudulent Scheme Involving Over $59 Million

content.content: A criminal complaint was unsealed recently alleging that Eddy Alexandre committed commodities fraud and wire fraud offenses in connection with a purported cryptocurrency and forex trading platform called EminiFX. The Justice Department alleges that Alexandre “induced his clients to invest over $59 million with promises of huge passive income returns via his own proprietary trading platform called EminiFx.”  This seems pertinent considering what is going on in this space recently, I guess we have to wait and see who might be next.    justice.gov – 12 May 22    CEO Of Cryptocurrency And Forex Trading Platform Charged With Fraudulent...
